p: The differential expression of proteins was visualized by using a heatmap based on sample group and mass to charge (m/z) ratio. This shows the relative up- and down-regulated expression of proteins in each individual seminal plasma sample. All differentially expressed proteins were up-regulated in the seminal plasma from the infertile group [Figure 3a, b]. Using the previously published database for seminal proteins,[ 14 23] we were able to propose the potential identity of some proteins [ Table 1].
